definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Even if not to stay, so grand luxury Memorial also to be a trip.
sentences.chinese: 即使留不住，如此隆重奢华的祭奠也算不虚此行吧。

sentences.english: Think sports cars and flashy SUVs depreciate the most?
sentences.chinese: 以为跑车，奢华的越野车折价得最多吗？

sentences.english: The product is extremely luxurious and the taste is so excellent.
sentences.chinese: 产品极尽奢华，品味扬其俊美。

sentences.english: The guests were all in the dining room now, sitting down to their excess of appetizers.
sentences.chinese: 客人们现在都坐在餐厅里，吃开了他们奢华的开胃菜。

sentences.english: Yes, you have made a reservation of two deluxe rooms for two nights.
sentences.chinese: 是的，您订了两间奢华房，住两晚。

sentences.english: This is the Motor City. This is what we do.
sentences.chinese: 这里是汽车城，我们以打造奢华为本。

sentences.english: The dolls thus arrayed all wear the sumptuous court garb of the Heian period.
sentences.chinese: 所有的玩偶皆身穿平安时代奢华的法官服装。

sentences.english: There was a rich man who was clothed in purple and fine linen and who feasted sumptuously every day.
sentences.chinese: 有一个财主穿著紫色袍和细麻布衣服，天天奢华宴乐。
他是在奢华的环境中长大的。

sentences.english: The garden was decorated so majestically that even Yuanchun thought it to be too luxurious.
sentences.chinese: 园林是如此庄严，即使装饰石元春认为它过于奢华。

sentences.english: Taking advantage of abstract line, brilliant color and high-sounding intersperse reveals luxurious feature.
sentences.chinese: 抽象的线条，大胆的颜色和夸张的点缀尽显致奢华。

sentences.english: The most luxurious outdoor home theaters are nostalgic reminders of the drive-in theaters of old.
sentences.chinese: 最奢华的户外电影院是老式汽车影院的怀旧翻版。

sentences.english: People visit www.qieWO.comtheir families and arrange some of the most lavish parties.
sentences.chinese: 人们参观他们的家庭和安排一些最奢华的政党。

sentences.english: The blue and white Yun silk quilt, exquisite luxury, quiet and elegant.
sentences.chinese: 此款青花雅韵蚕丝被，细腻奢华，安静典雅。

sentences.english: Extreme luxury resides in every detail at The Fullerton Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 极度奢华居住在新加坡浮尔顿的每一个细节。

sentences.english: As the star of a circus, Boog has lived a luxurious life.
sentences.chinese: 身为马戏团的大明星，布榖过着十分奢华的生活。

definition: gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
